task.summary: Refactored basic code. Optimised Intro UI
Enhanced UI/UX. Added App theme used for Intro Activity. Rearranged items in the Nav Drawer. Switched to Material Icons than system defaults
Added zoom at start up functionality. Adjusted UI for registering and reporting trip, problem. Created user model to store basic personal user info
Reduced speed threshold to be 180 than 200
Added local storage of travel information via SugarORM. Created Trip model and Issue model.
Upgraded Travel information to Home screen. Latest travel info appears there. Screen is updated as need be.

MESSAGE.value: Refactored basic code. Optimised Intro UI
Enhanced UI/UX. Added App theme used for Intro Activity. Rearranged items in the Nav Drawer. Switched to Material Icons than system defaults
Added zoom at start up functionality. Adjusted UI for registering and reporting trip, problem. Created user model to store basic personal user info
Reduced speed threshold to be 180 than 200
Added local storage of travel information via SugarORM. Created Trip model and Issue model.
Upgraded Travel information to Home screen. Latest travel info appears there. Screen is updated as need be.
